# ModImg Manager

## Overview

Tab 3 in Project Editor. Manage mod images: import, export, organize in folders with preview.

## Supported Formats

| Format | Extension | Use Case |
|--------|-----------|----------|
| PNG | .png | UI elements (transparency) |
| JPG | .jpg, .jpeg | Backgrounds (small size) |
| BMP | .bmp | Uncompressed |
| GIF | .gif | Animations |

## Key Functions

**Import:**
1. Select destination folder
2. Click Import Image
3. Multi-select files
4. Auto-overwrites duplicates

**Export:**
1. Select image
2. Click Export
3. Choose save location

**Folders:**
- Create: Organize by category (UI, Characters, Effects, Items)
- Delete: Removes folder and all images
- Max 3 levels recommended
